name: Outdoor Research Frostline Hat - Unisex
description: A seriously warm hat for seriously cold weather. Water-resistant with a heavy fleece lining, it features ear flaps and a fold-out facemask for days that really, really resemble the tundra.Pertex® Endurance10 fleece with Posh Pile lining is exceptionally warm and breathable.Fold-out Thermodynamic face mask features a zip pocket for storage.Ear flaps seal out icy winds.Foam-stiffened brim magnetically secures to crown when not in use.External drawcord keeps everything in place when running for the train.
